Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Provides a judicial remedy to resolve complaints related to utility bills
Summary: Provides a judicial remedy to resolve complaints related to utility bills that have an alleged amount of damages exceeding twenty-five thousand dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing a customer of gas or electric services the right to commence an action prior to making a formal complaint with the commission
